|physical = <!-- Yes or leave blank if no information in this section --> |powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This ASUS product is a PCIe to M.2 adapter for an :[[Intel Dual Band Wireless-AC 9260 (9260NGW)]]
==Notes== <small> *'''Up to 5x-faster WiFi''' - Wide 160 MHz channels drive wireless speeds :up to 1.73Gbps in the 5GHz band. *'''Top speed for all devices''' - Built-in MU-MIMO technology enables all :connected devices to run at the best attainable speed. *'''Bluetooth 5.0 for faster, farther coverage''' - Experience Bluetooth data :transfers up to twice as fast as before, and with 4x the range. *'''Blackspot-reducing external antenna''' - Freestanding transceiver and :connecting cable allows easy positioning for the best reception. </small>
==See also== :[https://www.asus.com/Networking/Wireless-Adapters-Products/ ASUS Wireless Adapters] ;PCIe series *[[ASUS PCE-AC88]] ([https://www.amazon.com/dp/B01H9QMOMY AC1900]) • [[ASUS PCE-AC68]] (AC1900) • [https://www.amazon.com/dp/B00F42V83C Amazon] • [https://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=9SIA25V6K14597 NE] *[[ASUS PCE-AC66]] (AC1750) • [[ASUS PCE-AC56]] (AC1300) • [https://www.amazon.com/dp/B00PF20VO8 Amazon] • [https://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=9SIAGUK7X95520 NE] *[[ASUS PCE-AC55BT]] ([https://www.amazon.com/dp/B01EX7KP46 AC1200]) • [[ASUS PCE-AC55BT B1]] ([https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0713RRZMB AC1200]) • [https://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=9SIA1K664V3936 NE] *[[ASUS PCE-AC51]] (AC750) • ASUS PCE-AC58BT ([http://www.amazon.com/dp/B07P61CK87 AC2100]) • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/PCE-AC58BT/ PPage]
